issue.title: [Java] Extract set null method to the base class for fixed width vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6209](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6209). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, each fixed width vector has the setNull method. All these implementations are identical, so we move them to the base class.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6209?focusedCommentId=16905536) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5064
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5064>
